lead_paragraph: Directed by Malcolm J. Goodwin, from a Victor Hawks script, Pass the Light follows 17 year-old high school student Steve Bellafiore (Cameron Palatas). Disturbed by a congressional candidate’s use of religion to spread hatred and intolerance, Steve r
